alert.note: Alert for Inland Northern Brevard; Inland Southern Brevard; Mainland Northern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 13 at 1:34PM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Brevard County through 215 PM EST... At 134 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cocoa, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rockledge, Cocoa, Cocoa Beach, Cape Canaveral and Merritt Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
